description: And you thought buying the car was difficult! Insurance providers are just waiting to insure you and your new automobile, but what protection you need, and how much, may be very different from what they are offering. Sorting through the various aspects of auto insurance and determining the correct deductibles may be easier after you read some of the articles in this section.
title: Auto Insurance
title_page: Auto Insurance - The New York Times
maintext:
Moved During the Pandemic? You May Need to Update Your Insurance.
Many people changed where and how they lived, but “upgrading their policies for all of these experiences fell by the wayside,” an appraisal executive said.
